summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Good Wife
Review Date: 2014/02/03
Categories: Drama
Product Description: ['Pushing aside the betrayal and crushing public humiliation caused by her husband, Peter, Alicia Florrick starts over by pursuing her original career as a defense attorney.  As a junior associate at a prestigious Chicago law firm, she joins her longtime friend, former law school classmate and firm partner Will Gardner, who is interested in rekindling their former relationship.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rosemary Rodriguez', 'Michael Zinberg', 'Brooke Kennedy', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Jim McKay', 'Frederick E.O. Toye', 'Robert King', 'Matt Shakman', 'Nelson McCormick']}
Review Text: I just started this series and it it hard to stop watching it!  I love the main character Alicia.  My next  favorite is Zack, her son.  Both of them are so smart and yet, vulnerable.  Strong women will love this.  If you want to be a strong woman you will love it too.  If men would like to be better men, they can pick up a few pointers from this series as well.  Enjoy!
Review Title: Very good program
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2014/02/03
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bobby Quinn'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Carson', 'Ed McMahon', 'Bill Clinton'], 'Studio': ['Respond2 Entertainment']}
Review Text: Carson was a one of a kind, never to be duplicated.  I use to watch this program with my parents as a child.  Never a dull one.  You will like this video.
Review Title: Great memories!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Thompson', 'Ron Yerxa'], 'Starring': ['Bruce Dern', 'Will Forte'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']}
Review Text: A depressing film about a subject most baby boomers are familiar with  Alzheimer's and dementia.  The caring sons try to make their father see reality but it only breaks his heart.  The boys try to make everything right but it never will be.  The youngest son finally sees the light and does what it takes to bring some peace and dignity to his fathers life.  The best scene is when the other tells her relatives to ______, themselves!  :-).
Review Title: Good ending, but slow.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for drama-driven narratives that feature complex characters, particularly strong female protagonists. The individual shows a discerning taste for high-quality productions as evidenced by consistently high ratings (averaging around 4.5 to 5.0) across all reviews. Additionally, there is an evident nostalgia for classic entertainment, as indicated by their enjoyment of past shows and films.

Themes of resilience and personal struggle are prevalent, suggesting they gravitate towards stories that explore emotional depth and human experiences. The analysis also highlights a preference for titles that can be shared with family members, indicating a value placed on connecting with loved ones through media. 

Quality emerges as a dominant theme, with preferences leaning towards well-produced content that provides a captivating viewing experience, while sensitivity to weak plots or poor execution is notable, as reflected in the sharply negative reviews of less satisfactory titles. Price sensitivity is less apparent, implying that the focus is primarily on the quality of the viewing experience rather than cost. Overall, this individual values compelling storytelling, character-driven plots, and emotional resonance in their media consumption.

target_interaction.title: Everyone Needs to See Ths Series!
target_interaction.text: I love this show!  This is a series everyone should watch.  Especially the thirty and under group of Americans. The opening gives me chill bumps when I see the German swastica and the Japanese Flag in where we know to be the United States of America.  We American s take our freedom for granted too often.  Keep the shows coming!
target_interaction.title_meta: The Man in the High Castle
description: After giving Joe the film, Juliana is forced to flee the fury of the Resistance while embarking on a new path to save her home from destruction. Joe confronts his absent father in Berlin, who is not as he seems. Smith wrestles with what to do about his ill son. Frank takes a gamble with his life in a bid to save Ed. Tagomi's life is turned upside down by his "travel" to an alternative world.
target_interaction.subtitle: Season 2
